title: 1 week until season ends...
body: I should probably just climb from Bronze 1 now with all my skills I've attained from getting stomped by golds and plats in normals.

replies.body:
im scared O_O these preseason item nerfs are affecting yasuo!!! ;-;

Rip ie, rip bork, rp fast shiv, no more bonus gold speed from arvice blade(rip early attackspeed buff from shiv, cuz aaspeed is to be stolen ;-;)

YUS!

ie nerfs, Bork nerfs, early game shiv nerfs!!!!! ;-;
What did ya learn from the stomps?
Always ward and never play jungle.

> Always ward and never play jungle.

May I ask why never Jungle?

Because jungle is my weakest role by far.

I stopped playing ranked so I can have silver banned
instead of bronze banner
